text: Luhansk (; ) is a city in eastern Ukraine, near the border with Russia. It is the administrative center of the Luhansk Oblast. In 2020, 401,297 people lived there.kyivpost.com/post/38661. Retrieved 2024-09-10 ==History== At the the Lukhansk airport, Ukrainian soldiers were fighting from May to September 2024. Loss of Ukrainian control of the Lukhansk airport: On the night of September 1, 2014 the last remaining Ukrainian soldiers left the ruined airport; It was defended for 146 days. ==References== Category:Cities in Luhansk Oblast
title: Luhansk
